about_the_game:
Wizzerd Quest Is BACK!

From the unhinged laboratories of Kondoorsoft comes Wizzerd Quest 2, an ambitious new action RPG designed to evoke the sentiments of the classic RPGs that inspired it, streamlined to remove the fat and fully playable on day one with split-screen multiplayer co-op!

STORY: The Emperor Is Dead!

You have returned from abroad to find your homeland overrun by the Rising Night, a necromancer cult proclaiming the name of your newly deceased emperor. With the kingdoms of the Evenfall Bay already at each others' throats, it is up to you to drive the necromancers out, region by region, and restore balance to the bay, before taking the fight to the Wustial Catherdral and destroying them for good.

GAMEPLAY: Wizzerd Quest gets a BIG upgrade!

Experience the iconic Wizzerd Quest writing and optional co-op gameplay paired with major enhancements, including but not limited to:

  • A huge, detailed open world to explore, broken into distinct regions, each with their own unique visual style
  • A refreshed combat system that allows the player to handle encounters in many different ways
  • A rich diversity of enemies with unique animations, smarter AI, and ranged abilities able to hit you from a distance
  • A faction reputation system that affects how you are treated based on how you treat NPCs
  • Joinable guilds, each with their own set of side quests, allowing the player to earn money in ways other than combat - but not all of them are the good guys...
  • Inns and taverns where the player can kick back, relax and heal up in comfort
  • Home ownership in regions where the townsfolk like you, allowing you to become more than just a visitor
  • Hokey, live-action FMV cutscenes straight out of 1997
  • A ton more surprises on the horizon!

ACCESSIBILITY: Play your way!

Wizzerd Quest 2 is the first Kondoorsoft game to support full key remapping, adjustable audio volume, FOV adjustment, fine-tuned graphical settings, and cutscene subtitles. And with rock-solid performance optimizations, you can enjoy the game on all but the most stubborn of potatoes!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.5, Debian Jesse or Fedora 35
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 or AMD Athlon 3000G or Steam Deck
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 550 or Steam Deck GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Ventura or newer
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core i5-6500
  • Graphics: Apple M1 7-Core or AMD Radeon RX 5500M
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Wizzerd Quest 2

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 or AMD Athlon 3000G
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 550 or GeForce GT 1030 2GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Experience a charming first-person RPG straight out of the '90s, with lush environments, dark dungeons, sarcastic writing and live-action FMV cutscenes! Go alone or team up with a friend to save Evenfall Bay in this chaotic adventure from the developers behind the freeware hit Wizzerd Quest!
